p: Zataria multiflora essential oil was purchased from Barij Essence Company (Kashan-Iran) and approved by the same herbarium company (No.1203). Commercial base ointment and mupirocin were prepared from Pars Daruo. Ltd., Tehran, Iran. The commercial base ointment contained 90% soft paraffin, 5% hard paraffin and 5% lanolin. Rodent feeds were prepared from Javaneh Khorasan Company (Khorasan, Iran).
